page.title: 09Sporting interests
page.content: Leighton and I did a survey to see what sports we do in our spare time. There are twenty three children in our class and most of us live in the countryside and a few of us live in the town. Here are our results:- {football}6,{swimming}2,{fishing}2, {dancing}1,{BMX}3,{horse riding}4, {tennis}1,{badmington}1,{table tennis 1,{cricket}1,{radio controlled car {racing}1,.There are quite alot of clubs around here so some people go to them. In the{rugby}season Leighton plays rugby for Horsham on Sunday and on Saturdays Leighton and I play {football}for Southwater and on Mondays Leighton and I go training for Southwater. At School we do AAA 5* awards in Class 4 and in Class 3 we do 10 step awards{(athletics).
